committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to authorize the replacement of existing pump casings in Southern Nevada Water Project Pumping Plants 1A and 2A, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to replace specified cast steel pump casings and minor appurtenant parts at the southern Nevada water project, first stage. Requires the State of Nevada to install such casings in a manner satisfactory to the Secretary. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the replacement of existing pump casings in Southern Nevada Water Project Pumping Plants 1A and 2A, and for other purposes.
